text: int main ( ) { int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , i , j , l , m , n , t ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; while ( n -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < t ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j < i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; for ( l = t - 1 ; l >= 0 ; l -- ) for ( m = 0 ; m <= l - 1 ; m ++ ) if ( a [ l ] [ m ] > a [ l ] [ m + 1 ] ) a [ l - 1 ] [ m ] = a [ l - 1 ] [ m ] + a [ l ] [ m ] ; else a [ l - 1 ] [ m ] = a [ l - 1 ] [ m ] + a [ l ] [ m + 1 ] ; printf ( "%d\n" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
